entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @Yamiche @MamaBear64 According to a study done on monkeys, doctors think the risk of reinfection is very low. They couldn’t reinfect the monkeys after recovering from covid19. Good news, but to most this won’t matter much as the point of what we’re doing is trying to avoid infection to begin with.
